item.title: Large acacia tree with dead boughs, 11th August
item.description:

item.title: Uneven road surface, 11th August
item.description:
Road dips both sides so much that cars lower to the ground are being damaged underneath when turning round here, which is multiple times a day. Also an issue for residents parking here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harcourt Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Nitrous Oxide Canisters, 11th August
item.description:
At the entrance to the foot tunnel from Brook Lane to Blendon Road. This is down the ramp right where the underground foot tunnel starts. There are 2 of the large boxes full of what I presume are the large empty nitrous oxide canisters. I’m estimating 8-10 canisters. Part of the Music in the Park event I’m guessing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Blendon Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bucket with human excrement and bottles of urine, 11th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lafone Street, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Music/noise, 11th August
item.description:
